title: Ember DOM Ready
summary: Ember is awesome, in my biased opinion, but it presents interesting new challenges for developers. One of the most common patterns used in web development is to handle a DOM ready event but relying on that in a one-page application isn't possible.

title: Viking Base
summary: The Viking Base is a set of front-end technologies that have been combined to create a solid platform with which to build web applications. It combines Ember, Handlebars and Foundation with the HTML5 Boilerplate Ant Built Script.
